divs: Sighting DetailsI was out this morning a few minutes before 6am CST looking at the stars for about 30 seconds and I noticed a triangle that went directly over our house. It was not well lit but all three points had what appeared to be rows of lights. It was so low it looked like I could almost hit it if I threw a ball at it. It was VERY quiet and it seemed to be gone in seconds. It went almost directly South to North. The thing is that it was real! I really didn't think it was a big deal as I thought I would just Google it after work and find out why these things are flying around and see one some other time. Little did I know that there is no explanation for these yet. I have never had any interest in UFO's and still would rather not see these things. I am in my mid 40's do not drink or do drugs and I just went to the eye Dr in February. I wish I would not have witnessed this as I have enough going on. I hope to just forget about it now but what the heck was it?? Must be the military.....
trends: There have been no other sightings in Granite Falls
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A Triangle - Not well lit, very quiet, low.
